title: Podcast 349: How self-boundaries can help improve self-esteem, overcome self-loathing, and rebuild identity after trauma
description:
Sign up to Patreon to get access to the full session video & audio + additional exclusive bonuses: https://www.patreon.com/drcarolineleaf


EPISODE DESCRIPTION: In this podcast you will get a chance to listen to the first session I did at my recent Mental Health Retreat in Dallas, Texas.

EPISODE HIGHLIGHTS:

ðŸ§ How to identify, set, and maintain healthy self-boundaries 

ðŸ§ Different types of self-boundaries 

ðŸ§ How to avoid common mistakes when setting self-boundaries 

ðŸ§ How self-boundaries can help rebuild identity after trauma and during healing 

ðŸ§ How self-boundaries can help restore balance in the brain + the neuroscience of boundaries 

ðŸ§ A Neurocycle for rebuilding identity & overcoming self-loathing or low self-esteem
